mapper.select: select fi.file_name, c.card_title, fi.file_upload_date, fi.file_hits, fh.pfile_name, fh.upload_date from board b, list l, card c, file_info fi, file_history fh where b.board_id = l.board_id and l.list_id = c.list_id and c.card_id = fi.card_id and fi.file_id = fh.file_id and b.workspace_id = #{workspaceid}
